title: Tempting a Wolf
description: BBW Tameca Corrigan, still a virgin at twenty-five, has been attracted to Marcus, her sister's boss, for two years now. All Tameca wants is to get the V off her chest with whatever man she can find. A man as hot as Marcus would be too much to ask for. But when Marcus begins to demonstrate his determination to have her, her sister warns Tameca that he is out of her league.
author: Tressie Lockwood
